meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_sbportfolio2_domain_model_category

languageKey.label: The category's title. Used in the FE and in table listings in the BE.
An alternative title for use in the FE.
An alternative title for use in the FE when space is restricted.
A short summary of the category.
A short summary of the category.
The category's full description, this can include links and images.
The category's links.
The category's files.
The category's tags.
The category's Parent category. This enables you to make a hierarchy of categories.
The category's image.
The category's content slider title.
The category's content slider image.
The category's content slider description.
The category's title for SEO metatags.
The category's type for SEO metatags.
The category's image for SEO metatags.
Facebook uses a square image at least 50x50 pixels, the image cannot exceed 130x110 pixels.
The category's description for SEO metatags.
The category's Facebook Application ID.
The category's Facebook Admin IDs.
The date that this item should start showing up in the FE.
The date that this item should stop showing up in the FE.
